channel.title: 15-744 Announcements
channel.description: Announcements feed for the 15-744 Computer Networks course

item.title: Projects due 05/14
item.description: Project writeups are due 05/14 to make sure we have a few days to grade them before CSD black friday. Please disregard the earlier due date of 05/09.

item.title: Tools homework 2 update
item.description: If you haven't done part of of hw2 yet, we suggest pinging the host <tt>eep.lcs.mit.edu</tt> instead of <tt>www.cs.cmu.edu</tt>. www.cs seems to have a per-host IP ID counter, so it worked in the tests we ran from a single machine, but doesn't work when pinging from two hosts.

item.title: Tools homework 2 online
item.description: The second tools homework is now online. Note that scriptroute does not want to compile on andrew linux machines. Use either your own or a CS linux machine if you have problems.

item.title: Syllabus updated
item.description: The rest of the semester is filled in.

item.title: midterm and ps2 solutions
item.description: Midterm and problem set 2 solutions have been posted. (If you have not already, you can pick up your HWs and midterms from Jeff.)

item.title: scheduling project meetings
item.description: Please contact Barbara Gardillo, the course secretary, with the times your group can meet next Wednesday (bag AT cs DOT cmu DOT edu).

item.title: syllabus updated
item.description: The mobility lecture was moved to after spring break and the Best of Broadcast lecture inserted.

item.title: ps1 solutions annoted with points
item.description: Also, Q7 and Q9 had typos. Fixed now.

item.title: Bug fixed in ps1 solutions
item.description: The solution for TCP Tahoe was buggy. It's fixed.

item.title: Problem Set 2 is available
item.description: Check the assignments link.

item.title: ns Tutorial Recitation
item.description: Jeff will hold a short tutorial on ns this Friday at 3:00-4:30PM in WeH 5409.

item.title: Link for CSZ'92 fixed
item.description: The CSZ'92 postscript was buggy. The link now points to a verified good PDF.

item.title: Project proposals due 2/14.
item.description: The project proposals are due a week from today.

item.title: RED paper link updated
item.description: The paper link for RED has been updated. The postscript was buggy; the newly linked PDF is happy.

item.title: Office hour time selection on discussion site
item.description: Now that the class membership is a bit more stable, there's a post on the discussion site where people should express their preferences for office hour slots, if you have any. We'll have the actual hours established by Monday.

item.title: Problem set 1 small change
item.description: In section E, please draw the THREE RTTs following the loss, not just one. The problem set has been updated.

item.title: Problem set 1 available
item.description: The first theory problem set is now online.

item.title: Reading for Monday: Just a subset of GR
item.description: For Monday, you do NOT need to read all of GR yet. We\'ll be returning to this paper a bit later. For monday, please read the intro, section 2, skim over 6, and read the conclusion.

item.title: Announcements RSS feed now available
item.description: You can now subscribe to the 15-744 announcements as an RSS feed.

item.title: Fundamentals Review Recitation
item.description: The recitation for reviewing network fundamentals will be this Friday, 1/26 from 3-4:30PM in room WeH 4615A. The slides are available here, and more can be found on last fall's 15-441 page.
